lines: Welcome, welcome. I'm Buscarron, and this is my place.
Soldier, merchant, adventurer─it don't matter to me as long as you follow Druthers etiquette. That is: sit down, forget your worries, and savor your ale.
Always a pleasure, my friend. No doubt you're weary from the road. Sit yourself down wherever you like.
The Qiqirn firewater still wants for aging, but we've got no shortage of other quality brews.
Seems you've been keeping busy of late, lasslad. What's all this talk I hear about you becoming some great hero, eh?
Well, whenever the weight of fame gets too heavy, you just bend your course hither. Whatever you might be outside, at the Druthers you're free to be just another soul seeking a moment of respite.
Well, if it isn't Forename! I hear tell that you and the Scions've relocated to Mor Dhona.
It's a long way from here, to be sure. Which gladdens me all the more that you've made time to pay old Buscarron visit.
If you see Spenser around, tell him to get his sorry arse back in here. Bastard stumbled out without paying his tab...again.
Forename, what a pleasant surprise! I heard they opened up a tavern at Revenant's Toll, and I was afraid you wouldn't come here any more.
But of course, I needn't have worried. It ain't only the grog what brings people to the Druthers, but the camaraderie. And that is something we've got in abundance.
I hear you're in a spot of bother, lasslad. Whatever happens, know that you'll always have a home here at the Druthers.
By the way, do you know what's become of Laurentius? Last I heard, he'd turned over a new leaf and joined the Crystal Braves.
...So the rumors about Laurentius are true!? That bloody fool! He had a golden chance to start over, and he went and shat all over it!
I'd set aside a bottle of my best mead to celebrate his release, but it looks like we won't be opening it after all. Instead, I'm going to smash it over his head the next time I see him!

obj.n: Dans les mille gueules du loup
La grande famille de la Poste mog
Une volonté forgée dans la pierre
Gants sans doigts en cuir de bouquetin
Ras de cou en cuir rigide
